name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retry in Another AI - Transfer conversations between ChatGPT and Claude

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retry conversations between ChatGPT and Claude with a single click - continue your chat in another AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Retry in Another AI - ChatGPT & Claude Conversation Transfer

Seamlessly continue your AI conversations between ChatGPT and Claude! This extension adds convenient "Retry" buttons to both platforms, allowing you to instantly transfer your entire conversation history between these leading AI assistants with just one click.

## Key Features:

• One-Click Transfer: Easily move your conversations between ChatGPT and Claude
• Full Context Preservation: Maintains the entire conversation history for better continuity
• Clean Interface: Integrates naturally with both ChatGPT and Claude's existing UI
• Instant Setup: No configuration needed - works right after installation

## Perfect for:

• Comparing responses between different AI models
• Getting a second opinion on complex questions
• Continuing conversations when one service is at capacity
• Cross-checking AI responses for better accuracy
• Overcoming model-specific limitations

## How It Works:

1. Install the extension
2. Chat with either ChatGPT or Claude as usual
3. Click the "Retry" button next to any AI response
4. Your conversation will automatically open in the other AI platform, ready to continue

## Privacy & Security:

• Works entirely in your browser
• No data collection or external servers
• No account required
• Your conversations remain private

Make the most of both AI assistants and enhance your productivity by easily switching between them. Get more comprehensive answers and insights by leveraging the unique strengths of each AI model.

Try it now and experience seamless AI conversation continuity!
